topic.title: Non Drug Allergy Organizer Actually Dreg - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component, where its type is EMS Drug Allergy (CONF:11321)
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Drug Allergy (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.48)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Existence Of Drug Allergy Observation (CONF:11322)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Existence Of Drug Allergy Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.102)
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type x_ActClassDocumentEntryOrganizer
Contains exactly one [1..1] @moodCode with data type ActMood
Contains exactly one [1..1] statusCode with data type CS

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component, where its type is EMS Drug Allergy (CONF:11321)
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Drug Allergy (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.48)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Existence Of Drug Allergy Observation (CONF:11322)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Existence Of Drug Allergy Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.102)

body.codeblock: <organizer xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="217372943"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2014"/> <high value="2014"/> </effectiveTime> <component> <act> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.48"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="741956665"/> <code code="2007044812"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2014"/> <high value="2014"/> </effectiveTime> <participant> <participantRole/> </participant> </act> </component> <component> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.102"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="329758329"/> <code code="67794-8" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Does the patient have any medication allergies NEMSIS"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2014"/> <high value="2014"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </component> </organizer>

p.ph: Non Drug Allergy Organizer Actually Dreg
